description:
SOUTH OF BOWLING GREEN	
T1	Dead Elm (Ulmus spp)	Ivy clad tree - Fell to ground level as tree is dead. 
T2	Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)	Tree in reasonable condition - some dead stems in centre of crown. Reduce crown to the most recent previous
        reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new growth. Final height 8m and final overall spread 6m.

T3	Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)	Tree in poor condition - dead stems in centre of crown. Staining at base. Remove dead branches.
T4	Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)	Tree in good condition. Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new
        growth. Final height 9m and final overall spread 7m. 
T5	Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus)	Tree in good condition. Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new growth.
         Final height 8m and final overall spread 6m. 

T6	Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)	Tree in good condition. Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new        growth. Final height 10m and final overall spread 8m.
